title: Cannot login to my account
description: I've been trying to login for the past hour but keep getting 'Invalid credentials' error. I'm sure my password is correct.
resolution: Password was expired. Reset link sent to user's email. User successfully logged in after resetting password.

title: Payment failed but money deducted
description: My payment failed during checkout but the amount was deducted from my bank account. Order not placed.
resolution: Verified with payment gateway. Transaction was pending and auto-reversed within 3-5 business days. Confirmed reversal completed.

title: How to export my data?
description: I need to export all my data from the platform. Can't find the option in settings.
resolution: Guided user to Account Settings > Privacy > Export Data. Feature is available in the dropdown menu under Data Management section.

title: Dashboard not loading
description: The dashboard page shows blank white screen after login. Other pages work fine.
resolution: Issue caused by browser cache. Cleared cache and cookies. Advised user to use Ctrl+F5 for hard refresh. Dashboard loaded successfully.

title: Two-factor authentication setup
description: Need help setting up 2FA on my account for better security.
resolution: Walked user through 2FA setup: Settings > Security > Enable 2FA. Used Google Authenticator app. Backup codes provided and saved.

title: Invoice not received
description: Made a payment 3 days ago but haven't received the invoice via email.
resolution: Invoice was in spam folder. Resent invoice to registered email. Whitelisted sender domain to prevent future issues.

title: Add dark mode feature
description: Would love to have a dark mode option. Current bright theme strains eyes during night work.
resolution: Feature request logged and forwarded to product team. Expected in Q2 2024 release. User added to beta testing list.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: Android app crashes immediately after opening. Reinstalled twice but issue persists.
resolution: Identified incompatibility with Android 14. Updated app to latest version 2.3.1 from Play Store. Issue resolved after update.

title: Forgot username recovery
description: I forgot my username and can't login. Only remember my email address.
resolution: Username sent to registered email address. Advised user to save credentials in password manager for future reference.

title: Refund not processed
description: Requested refund 10 days ago but amount not credited to my account yet.
resolution: Refund was processed on Feb 1st. Takes 7-10 business days for bank credit. Provided transaction reference number for bank inquiry.

title: Bulk upload feature
description: Need ability to upload multiple files at once instead of one by one.
resolution: Feature already exists. Guided to Upload section > Select Multiple Files option (Ctrl+Click or Shift+Click). Supports up to 50 files.

title: Notification emails not arriving
description: Not receiving any notification emails for account activities.
resolution: Email notifications were disabled in preferences. Re-enabled in Settings > Notifications > Email Alerts. Test email sent successfully.

title: Account locked after failed attempts
description: Account got locked after entering wrong password 3 times.
resolution: Security feature activated after 3 failed attempts. Unlocked account and sent temporary password. Advised to update password immediately.

title: Duplicate payment charged
description: Was charged twice for the same transaction. Need one refund.
resolution: Confirmed duplicate charge in system. Initiated refund for duplicate transaction. Refund processed within 5-7 business days.

title: Search results inaccurate
description: Search function returns irrelevant results. Not finding what I'm looking for.
resolution: Search algorithm updated last week causing relevancy issues. Engineering team rolled back changes. Search now working with improved accuracy.
